parsed.internal_thinking: This is the first placement of the game. I'm looking for high-yield nodes with a good mix of resources for early expansion (Wood and Brick). Node 20 stands out with a total of 12 pips, including a 6-Brick and an 8-Sheep, which are high-frequency numbers. It also provides 11-Wood. This gives me a strong foundation for building roads and settlements early on. Node 43 has 13 pips but is triple Wheat, which is too specialized for a first placement. Node 42 is good for an Ore/Wheat strategy but lacks the expansion materials I want right now. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Secured a strong 6/8/11 spot (Node 20). Need to look for Ore and Wheat in the second round to balance the economy.
parsed.say_outloud: hey everyone! good luck to us all. i'll start things off over here on the 6-8-11.
